nodes.text: 0.8 % IOTest 3 Fixative Solution： Dilute 100 µl IOTest 3 Fixative Solution (10X) with 900 µl PBS
0.1 % IOTest 3 Fixative Solution：Dilute 12.5 µl IOTest 3 Fixative Solution (10X) with 987.5 µl PBS
1X PerFix-nc Buffer 3：Dilute 1 part 10X Buffer 3 with 9 parts of ddH2O
Collect peripheral blood samples directly into EDTA-vacutainers. Mix the blood sample by repeatedly inverting the vacutainer
For DuraClone IM Phenotyping Basic, T cell, TCRs and Granulocytes Tube: Transfer 100 µl blood into the DuraClone Tube
For DuraClone IM Dendritic Cells Tube: Transfer 200 µl blood into the DuraClone Tube
Vortex tube for 8 seconds. Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Add 2 ml VersaLyse Solution
Vortex tube for 3 seconds.  Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 200 g for 5 min
Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Vortex tube for 3 seconds
Add 3 ml DPBS
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 200 g for 5 min. Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Resuspend cell pellet in 380 µl 0.8 % IOTest 3 Fixative Solution for data collection using a Navios flow cytometer
Sample preparation using DuraClone IM Tubes: Phenotyping Basic, T cell subsets, TCRs and Dendritic Cells
Sample preparation using DuraClone IM Tubes: B cells
Collect peripheral blood samples directly into EDTA-vacutainers
Mix the blood sample by repeatedly inverting the vacutainer
Transfer 10 ml DPBS into a 15 ml conical bottom tube
Add 300 µl blood to the 10 ml DPBS. Mix by inverting the tube
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 300 g for 10 min
Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Vortex tube for 3 seconds
Add 10 ml DPBS
Mix by inverting the tube. Pellet cells by centrifugation at 300 g for 5 min
Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Resuspend cell pellet in DPBS to get a final volume of 300 µl
Transfer 100 µl of washed blood sample into the DuraClone IM B cells Tube.Vortex tube for 8 seconds
Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Add 2 ml VersaLyse
Vortex for 3 seconds.Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 200 g for 5 min
Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Vortex tube for 3 seconds
Add 3 ml DPBS
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 200 g for 5 min
Aspirate supernatant using vacuum a pump
Resuspend cells in 380 µl 0.1 % IOTest 3 Fixative Solution for data collection using a Navios flow cytometer
Sample preparation using DuraClone IM Tubes: Tregs
Collect peripheral blood samples directly into EDTA-vacutainers
Mix the blood sample by repeatedly inverting the vacutainer
Transfer 50 µl blood into the DuraClone IM Treg Tube 1
Vortex for 8 seconds. Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Add 3 ml DPBS
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 500 g for 5 min
Aspirate supernatant using vacuum pump
Vortex for 3 seconds
Add 50 µl heat-inactivated FCS
Mix by pipetting
Add 5 µl PerFix-nc Buffer 1
Vortex for 8 seconds.Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 15 min
Add 400 µl PerFix-nc Buffer 2
Vortex for 8 seconds
Transfer content of DuraClone IM Treg Tube 1 into DuraClone IM Treg Tube 2 by pipetting
Vortex Tube 2 for 8 seconds.Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 60 min
Add 3 ml DPBS
Incubate at room temperature in the dark for 5 min
Pellet cells by centrifugation at 500 g for 5 min.Aspirate supernatant using a vacuum pump
Resuspend cells in 380 µl 1X PerFix-nc Buffer 3 for data collection using a Navios flow cytometer
